# Tables 

## Data

```{r}
#| label: tbl-landings
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "Landings in metric tons (mt) by year for each fleet."

landings <- model_output[["catch"]] |>
  tibble::as_tibble() |>
  dplyr::filter(Yr > 1889) |>
   dplyr::select(Fleet_Name, Yr, ret_bio) |>
   dplyr::group_by(Yr) |>
   dplyr::mutate(
     ret_bio = round(ret_bio, 0),
     `Total (mt)` = sum(ret_bio)
   ) |>
   tidyr::pivot_wider(
     names_from = Fleet_Name,
     values_from = ret_bio
   ) |>
  dplyr::rename(
    Year = Yr,
    `TWL` = TWL,
    `HKL` = HKL,
    `Pot` = Pot,
    `TWL Discard` = TWL_Discards,
    `HKL Discard` = HKL_Discards,
    `Pot Discard` = Pot_Discard
  ) |>
  dplyr::relocate(`Total (mt)`, .after = `Pot Discard`) |>
  dplyr::ungroup()
kableExtra::kable(
  landings, 
  format = "latex", 
  longtable = TRUE,
  booktabs = TRUE,
  caption = "Landings in metric tons (mt) by year for each fleet.",
  linesep = "") |>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(
    latex_options = "repeat_header",
    font_size = 8)
#knitr::kable(landings)
    
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-twl-age-samples-comp

#| tbl-cap: "Change in the number of age samples by year for the trawl fleet."

  dplyr::select(-`Lengths (2019)`, - `Lengths (2024)`) |>

  dplyr::filter(dplyr::case_when(Fishery == "Fixed" ~ Year >= 1986, Fishery == "Trawl" ~ Year >= 1974)) |>

  gt::gt() |>

    table.font.size = 12,
    latex.use_longtable = TRUE
  ) |>
  gt::as_latex()

```

```{r, results = "asis"}
#| label: tbl-prop-area
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "Estimated percentage of sablefish biomass estimated north and south of 36 N. latitude based on the NWFSC WCGBT survey data over the last five years."
#| tbl-pos: H

wcgbt_area <- read.csv(here::here("report", "figures", "wcgbt_est_by_area.csv")) |>
  dplyr::filter(area %in%  c("North of Monterey Bay", "South of Monterey Bay")) |>
  dplyr::group_by(year) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    total_est = sum(est)
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Area = dplyr::case_when(area == "North of Monterey Bay" ~ "north", .default = "south"),
    prop = est / total_est
  ) |>
  dplyr::filter(year >= 2019)  |>
  dplyr::rename(
    Year = year,
    Proportion = prop) |>
  dplyr::select(Year, Area, Proportion) |>
  tidyr::pivot_wider(
    names_from = Area,
    values_from = Proportion
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Year = as.character(Year)
  ) |>
  as.data.frame()

average <- data.frame(
  Year = "Average",
  north = mean(as.numeric(wcgbt_area[, 2])),
  south = mean(as.numeric(wcgbt_area[, 3]))
)

all <- dplyr::bind_rows(wcgbt_area, average)
colnames(all) <- c(
  "Year", 
  "N. 36 Latitude",
  "S. 36 Latitude"
)

all |>
  dplyr::ungroup() |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::fmt_percent(
    columns = 2:3,
    decimals = 1
  ) |>
  gt::tab_options(
    table.font.size = 12,
    latex.use_longtable = TRUE
  ) |>
  gt::as_latex()

```

```{r}
    decimals = 0
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-maturity-samples
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "Maturity samples collected by the NWFSC West Coast Groundfish Bottom Trawl survey by year and area where north and south of 36 degress north latitude."

maturity_data |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Area = dplyr::case_when(latitude >= 36 ~ "North", .default = "South")) |>
  dplyr::group_by(year, Area) |>
  dplyr::summarise(
    Samples = dplyr::n()
  ) |>
  tidyr::pivot_wider(
    names_from = Area,
    values_from = Samples,
    names_prefix = "Samples-"
  ) |>
  dplyr::rename(Year = year) |>
  dplyr::ungroup() |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::tab_options(
    table.font.size = 12,
    latex.use_longtable = TRUE
  ) |>
  gt::as_latex()

```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-data-weights
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "Data weights from the base model."

ctl_file[["Variance_adjustment_list"]] |>
  dplyr::select(-factor) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    fleet = dplyr::case_when(
      fleet == 1 ~ "Trawl",
      fleet == 2 ~ "Hook-and-Line",
      fleet == 3 ~ "Pot",
      fleet == 4 ~ "Trawl Discard",
      fleet == 5 ~ "Hook-and-Line Discard",
      fleet == 6 ~ "Pot Discard",
      fleet == 7 ~ "Early Triennial",
      fleet == 8 ~ "Late Triennial",
      fleet == 9 ~ "NWFSC Slope",
      fleet == 10 ~ "WCGBT"
    )
  ) |>
  dplyr::rename(
    Fleet = fleet,
    `Data Weight` = value
  ) |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::fmt_number(
    columns = 2,
    decimals = 3
  ) |>
  gt::tab_options(
    table.font.size = 12,
    latex.use_longtable = TRUE
  ) |>
  gt::as_latex()

```
